fnss.adapters.omnetpp.to_omnetpp¶

to_omnetpp(topology, path=None)[source]¶

Convert an FNSS topology into an Omnet++ NED script.

Parameters:

topology : Topology

The topology object to convert

path : str, optional

The path to the output NED file. If not specified, prints to standard output
